import re
import seaborn as sns

source.08db0f5e:
comb = []
for i in all_csv:
    df = pd.read_csv(i)
    df['district_id'] = i.split('.')[0]
    comb.append(df)
comb_engage_df = pd.concat(comb)
comb_engage_df = comb_engage_df.reset_index(drop=True)
comb_engage_df.head()

for i in all_csv:
    df = pd.read_csv(i)
    all_rows.append(df.shape[0])
print(all_rows)

    df = pd.read_csv(i)
    max_eng_index.append(max(df['engagement_index']))
print(max_eng_index)
